page.title: 09Dishwashers or Washing up
page.content: There are only{3 people}in Mr. Walsh's class of 28{that have got dishwashers. Everybody else washes their dishes by hand. The people with dishwashers just open a kind of door and put the dishes in and the dishes are washed and come out nice and clean. In 20 years time, everybody may have dish washers apart from some people that cant afford it. Not many people have them because they are too expensive to buy. A long time ago people had to wash their clothes by hand but now nearly everybody has got washing machines. So the same will probably happen with dish washers. In our house nobody likes washing up. We all argue on Sunday, when it takes us half an hour to wash up, because nobody likes it.{by Jonathan Berry, {Clynton Barratt & Lorraine Davies {(8/9) }
